title: 2015 Fall Conference for Educators: Czechoslovakia and the Holocaust
desc: As a neighbor of Germany, Czechoslovakia was one of the first countries to face the Nazi onslaught. Join us to learn? about the fascinating history of this country? from Prof. Gerhard Weinberg, as well as? Karen Levine, ?documentarian and author of the children?s book? Hana's Suitcase. ?The conference will conclude with testimony from Holocaust survivor Fred Terna. ? Lunch will be provided at 12:30 p.m. ( dietary laws observed)  to all teachers who register by December 6 and receive a confirmation email.
